topic.name: Color
topic.further:
Color can be defined as the result a function (i.e. RGB, HSL), as a hash value (i.e. #651E30 or #FFE) or as a predefined name.
Predefined names include: black, silver, gray, white, maroon, red, purple, fuchsia, green, lime, olive, yellow, navy, blue, teal and aqua.
